title: Starting today my league of legends crashed my whole computer (3 times already)
body:
I was wondering if anyone knew if riot changed something on league **today**, this problem hasn't happen in the past until today. I would be in game playing and out of no where the screen freezes. I can't alt tab out or ctrl alt delete so I'm stuck there unless i manually hold the power button on my computer.

Anyone know why? Thanks

replies.body:
When your PC locks up and is completely unresponsive, it's generally due to a hardware or operating system issue. Since League patches only change files inside the League install directory, it's unlikely a patch caused this. While there are certainly a lot of potential causes for this issue, our [Bugsplat and Crash guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes) goes over some steps I recommend starting with. 

If you still experience system freezes after working through that guide, get back to me.
